code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{persistStore}from'redux-persist';import logger from'redux-logger';import persistedReducer from'./root-reducer';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import rootSaga from'./root-saga';var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var middlewares=[sagaMiddleware];if(process.env.NODE_ENV==='development'){middlewares.push(logger);}export var store=createStore(persistedReducer,applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares));export var persistor=persistStore(store);sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);
